<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Converting time in nanoseconds to milliseconds for already present records in NLQ Query Logs table</description>
        <name>Convert time to milliseconds in NLQ Logs</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var gr = new GlideRecord('nlq_query_log');
gr.orderBy('sys_created_on');
gr.query();
while (gr.next()) {
    gr.setValue('metadata_generation_time', (gr.getValue('metadata_generation_time') / 1000000).toFixed(3));
    gr.setValue('prediction_service_time', (gr.getValue('prediction_service_time') / 1000000).toFixed(3));
    gr.setValue('total_time', (gr.getValue('total_time') / 1000000).toFixed(3));
    gr.update();
} 

var gc = new GlideRecord('sys_documentation');
gc.addQuery('name', 'nlq_query_log');
gc.addQuery('language', 'en');
gc.query();
while (gc.next()) {
    if (gc.getValue('element') == 'metadata_generation_time') {
        gc.setValue('hint', 'Metadata generation time in milliseconds');
        gc.update();
    } else if (gc.getValue('element') == 'prediction_service_time') {
        gc.setValue('hint', 'Prediction Service call time in milliseconds');
        gc.update();
    } else if (gc.getValue('element') == 'total_time') {
        gc.setValue('hint', 'Total time in milliseconds');
        gc.update();
    }
}]]></script>
